attributes.action: Stop the sale of Bookers wholesale to Tesco.
attributes.background:
Tesco are attempting to buy Bookers, the UK's largest whokesale supplier to other grocery and independent stores.

Giving Tesco control over its competitors prices is unthinkable, this has to be stopped.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). It's been announced that the CMA will be looking into this.

You can find out more here: 
https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/competition-and-markets-authority
